name: cave-mouth
description: Sunlight streams down from an opening high above, you seem to be in the bottom of a deep cave.

items.name: small-key
items.description: It's a small iron key on a short length of string.
items.placement: A [small-key] is hanging on the wall.

features.name: cave-mouth-wooden-door
features.description: There is a simple [wooden-door] with an iron handle hidden in the shadows.

action.msg: You open the door and step into the Store Room

name: store-room
description: You are in a small store room dimly lit by a lantern.

features.name: store-room-wooden-door
features.description: There is a simple [wooden-door] with an iron handle hidden in the shadows.

action.msg: You open the door and step into the mouth of the cave
